name: helping
description: A collection of generic Javascript functions that help in day to day programming.
author: Sean Bannister

scripts.build: microbundle --entry index.js --output dist/minified/ --target web --format umd,es --name helping && microbundle --entry index.js --output dist/unminified/ --target web --format umd,es --name helping --no-compress && node post-build.js
